averageMoney: Average money earned by users yesterday
averageTime: Average time until user makes first cashout
des: Earn $1.00 per 5-10 minute offer and cashout instantly in Cryoto, Paypal, Gift cards, and more.
earningMoney: Earning money on ECO WALL has been made as simple as possible
howLong: How long does it take to cash out your money?
howLongContent: ECO WALL has a live support that is always online. Our team is working 24/7 and you can contact us any time at the top of the chat. If you request a withdrawal, it will most likely get approved in less than 2 minutes.
howMuch: How much money can you really earn on ECO WALL?
howMuchContent: It is easily possible to earn more than $100 per month on ECO WALL, some users even reach $1000+ each month. You can check out the Leaderboard to see how much the most active ECO WALL users earn.
howTo: How to make money on ECO WALL?
howToContentlinefour: After you have completed a task you will get coins. 1000 coins equal $1.00. You can cashout the coins for PayPal, VISA cards, Bitcoin, Amazon gift cards and multiple other types of gift cards.
howToContentlineone: ECO WALL works together with companies that want to advertise their apps, surveys and products.
howToContentlinethree: To get started choose an offer or survey. We can recommend the featured offers at the top of the Earn page. These tasks are very simple and many people have already successfully completed them in the past.
howToContentlinetwo: A task could be: Download an app and reach level 5 within 2 days to earn 4000 coins.
totalUsd: Total USD earned on ECO WALL
visit: Visit the earn page and start earning now!
